name: nutritionix-mcp
description: MCP server for Nutritionix API integration with MealAI

scripts.start:mac: export NIX_APP_ID=your_app_id && export NIX_APP_KEY=your_app_key && export DATABASE_URL=postgresql://mealai_user:mealai_password@localhost:5432/mealai && npm start
scripts.start:windows: set NIX_APP_ID=your_app_id && set NIX_APP_KEY=your_app_key && set DATABASE_URL=postgresql://mealai_user:mealai_password@localhost:5432/mealai && npm start
scripts.setup:mac: chmod +x start.sh && npm run docker:start:mac && npm run build
scripts.setup:windows: npm run docker:start && npm run build

author: MealAI
